# Dynamic Admin Dashboard Project

This is a React 18+ TypeScript project for creating a dynamic admin dashboard with drag-and-drop widgets.

## Tech Stack
- React 18+ with TypeScript
- Zustand for state management
- React Query (TanStack Query) for data fetching
- Shadcn/ui for UI components
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Recharts for data visualization
- react-grid-layout for drag-and-drop functionality

## Project Structure
- `/components/widgets/` - Draggable widget components
- `/components/layout/` - Grid layout components
- `/hooks/` - Custom hooks for layout persistence and widget registry
- `/stores/` - Zustand stores
- `/types/` - TypeScript type definitions

## Features
- Dynamic widget layout with drag & drop
- Glassmorphism UI design
- Layout persistence
- Responsive design
- Lazy loading widgets
- Widget registry system
